attributes.action: act to save the recently discovered sole surviving Union Jack flown by the Royal Navy at the Battle of Trafalgar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This flag was flown from the jackstaff of HMS Spartiate, one of Admiral Nelson's warships at the Battle of Trafalgar, and was presented to its Captain James Clephan by his grateful crew after the British victory.

It has remained in the Clephan family eversince but is now being sold at auction (by Charles Miller Ltd. 25 Blythe Road, London) on October 21st ( Trafalgar Day!) with an estimated pre-sale price of £15,000.

We suggest, indeed urge, the government ( or relevent government agency)to consider purchasing this unique slice of British heritage so that it may be preserved for the Nation (at a public institution) and not pass into private hands.
